layer.name: Order
layer.definition: An arrangement that displays the relationship between elements via a particular sequence, pattern, or method; the belief that reality is intelligible, structured, and meaningful rather than chaotic and random.

questions.text: I believe physical training works because the body adapts according to predictable principles.
I believe there are discoverable principles for building strength, endurance, and physical capability.
I see evidence of physical order in how athletes consistently improve through systematic training.
I reject the idea that physical capability is purely genetic, random, or beyond systematic development.
I believe the path to physical improvement can be mapped, studied, and followed.
